name: ice-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves an Alola sandshrew into Alola sandslash or an Alola vulpix into Alola ninetales.
short_effect: Evolves an Alola Sandshrew into Alola Sandslash or an Alola Vulpix into Alola Ninetales.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable snowflake pattern.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable snowflake pattern.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable snowflake pattern.
